numerical.analysis

Class PolynomialFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • numerical.analysis.PolynomialFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PolynomialSplineFunction

    public class PolynomialFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function
    This class aims to extend the concept of a function through the Function interface to polynomial functions along with additional instance variables and methods.
